address: Xã Nậm Xây, Huyện Văn Bàn, Tỉnh Lào Cai
thought:
**Analysis of Ward Restructuring for "Xã Nậm Xây, Huyện Văn Bàn, Tỉnh Lào Cai"**

My primary objective here is to determine the new administrative unit (ward) corresponding to the old address "Xã Nậm Xây, Huyện Văn Bàn, Tỉnh Lào Cai". I've approached this systematically, leveraging my understanding of Vietnamese administrative restructuring.

First, I established the old ward, "Xã Nậm Xây", and the province, "Tỉnh Lào Cai". Then, I considered the relevant legal instruments. A quick check of Province Resolutions (60-NQ/TW) confirmed that the province's name remains unchanged. No surprises there.

The crucial information lies in the available resolutions for administrative rearrangements. Resolution 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15 focused my attention. I carefully examined the specifics of each adjustment. Importantly, line 58 of that resolution definitively states that "Xã Nậm Xây" is merged with "xã Minh Lương" to form a new ward, also named "Xã Minh Lương." This is a crucial finding. The other resolutions were easily dismissed as irrelevant to my query.

Next, I cross-referenced this with the provided new ward data. I verified that a "Xã Minh Lương" indeed exists in "Tỉnh Lào Cai", identified by the ward code "03121". The structure of my data analysis clearly supports the fact that "Xã Nậm Xây" has been integrated into the new "Xã Minh Lương". The other available wards, like "Xã Văn Bàn" and those from "Tỉnh Phú Thọ", were easily discounted.

Ultimately, based on the explicit language of resolution "1673/NQ-UBTVQH15", combined with a confirmation from my ward data, I am confident that the new ward for the old address "Xã Nậm Xây, Huyện Văn Bàn, Tỉnh Lào Cai" is **"Xã Minh Lương"** within "Tỉnh Lào Cai", bearing ward code "03121". This is a straightforward application of the restructuring rules.

citation.header: 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lào Cai
citation.line: 58. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Nậm Xây và xã Minh Lương thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Minh Lương.
